Fire at street shop in China's Jiangxi province kills 39, several trappedA fire in the basement of a street shop in Xinyu City of Jiangxi Province has killed 39 people and injured nine, Chinese state media and the local government said on Wednesday, adding that some people were still trapped. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 13:11:53 GMT L3CHCN276BJLBIDLDBUF5CSIOE https://www.reuters.com/world/china/fire-street-shop-chinas-jianxi-province-kills-39-several-trapped-2024-01-24/Reuters世界中国
China announces closer ties with Uzbekistan, further cooperationChina has upgraded its diplomatic ties with Uzbekistan and offered closer cooperation across a range of energy, manufacturing and infrastructure projects, state media said on Wednesday. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 12:42:23 GMT HHZIENCJ2ZKP7P34GYLA6PZJBM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-announces-closer-ties-with-uzbekistan-further-cooperation-2024-01-24/Reuters世界中国
Tin shackled by surplus, but green industry demand poised to mop up suppliesThe potential for a build-up of tin supplies this year is likely to put pressure on prices, but accelerating demand from the energy transition sector, including solar panels and electric vehicles, should support prices in the future. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 12:28:49 GMT WBWV3VLUJ5OC7M4NVNJSNR2CE4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/tin-shackled-by-surplus-green-industry-demand-poished-mop-up-supplies-2024-01-24/Pratima Desai市场商品
India must approve GIFT City listings with investors from bordering nationsIndian government approval will be needed if a local company with shareholders from neighbouring countries such as China wants to list on exchanges registered in a new financial hub, according to rules issued on Wednesday. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 12:09:50 GMT AWDJAJYARBVCWZQUETOJLHOE https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-must-approve-gift-city-listings-with-investors-bordering-nations-2024-01-24/Nikunj Ohri, Jayshree Pyasi世界印度

Zheng finds groove to down Kalinskaya, reach Australian Open semisZheng Qinwen shook off a sluggish start to outclass Russian Anna Kalinskaya 6-7(4) 6-3 6-1 on Wednesday and reach the semi-finals of the Australian Open for the first time where the Chinese 12th seed will take on Ukrainian qualifier Dayana Yastremska. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 10:58:29 GMT CNXUTCRCVFP4PHXSRCGJ3ZWHR4 https://www.reuters.com/sports/tennis/zheng-finds-groove-down-kalinskaya-reach-australian-open-semis-2024-01-24/Shrivathsa Sridhar运动的网球
Medvedev battles to reach Australian Open semis, Yastremska cruisesDaniil Medvedev pounced on the few chances offered up by Hubert Hurkacz to seal a semi-final spot at the Australian Open on Wednesday, while Dayana Yastremska did the new generation proud by reaching the last four of a Grand Slam for the first time. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 10:13:02 GMT Q7777Y2M4ZJ6NCRWPLG2QEC2VY https://www.reuters.com/sports/tennis/medvedev-battles-reach-australian-open-semis-yastremska-cruises-2024-01-24/Shrivathsa Sridhar运动的网球
More German firms leave China or consider exit - surveyThe proportion of German firms exiting the Chinese market or considering doing so has more than doubled to 9% in the past four years, according to a survey by the German Chamber of Commerce in China. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 10:05:33 GMT CPNPN6K7H5NQDOYSCT23F6TECE https://www.reuters.com/world/china/more-german-firms-leave-china-or-consider-exit-survey-2024-01-24/Sarah Marsh世界中国
China rebuts Vietnam's claims to disputed South China Sea islandsThe Chinese foreign ministry on Wednesday said China's claims to the Paracel and Spratly Islands in the South China Sea were backed by "history" after Vietnam over the weekend repeated it had sufficient evidence to claim sovereignty over the islands. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 10:00:38 GMT VRUTFRQZYBNTDD4BDYFZLU5D5I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-rebuts-vietnams-claims-disputed-south-china-sea-islands-2024-01-24/Reuters世界亚太地区
China rocket startup Orienspace raises nearly $84 mlnChina's private rocket developer Orienspace has raised nearly 600 million yuan ($83.67 million) to fund rocket development, it said on Wednesday, as China's demand for commercial launches of satellites is expected to increase. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 09:47:52 GMT HBBH3675U5KVXH6G4MEYDJ3JEM https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/china-rocket-startup-orienspace-raises-nearly-84-mln-2024-01-24/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Exclusive: China Evergrande offshore bondholder group to join liquidation petition - sourcesA key offshore bondholder group of China Evergrande plans to join a petition to liquidate the developer at a hearing in a Hong Kong court on Monday, two sources with direct knowledge said. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 09:45:23 GMT LKPWVS67E5ISBBKJFKZLX4HNDA https://www.reuters.com/business/china-evergrande-offshore-bondholder-group-join-liquidation-petition-sources-2024-01-24/Clare Jim商业
